column5: Nice feed.  Is that composite decking?  How do you like working with it?

Yeh, I like it ...Lowe's had decking on sale here couple weeks ago. $1.45 / linear foot. There's a tool out now called "CAMO"...it spaces the boards & aligns the screws so they're hidden. The only drawback is the screws are expensive.  My pool deck is 8 years old now...very little maintenance required.
My fleet of smokers..2 UDS, (ugly drum smokers, & Ol' Nellie, a homemade horizontal...      But, I get visitors now & then...
Damm you for posting lol. Looks like a great scoff
Thats some nice bark on them ribs RW. Very nice. Just the way I like them.
I keep meaning to build a uds, my weber is a good all around cooker, but the possibilities with a uds are limitless.....  Thanks for the reminder that I need to get one built up  G
You sir, know your surf and turf.
